amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit funds made available in the Act from being used to require a local educational agency to provide student information to military recruiters pursuant to section 503(c) or title 10, United States Code, or section 9528(a) of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 (20 U.S.C. 7908(a)) without parental consent.

action.text: Mr. Regula raised a point of order against the Honda amendment (A012). Mr. Regula raised a point of order against the amendment stating that it proposed to change existing law and constituted legislation in an appropriations bill in violation of clause 2 of rule 21. The Chair sustained the point of order.
